name: Zitec
overview:
Zitec is a Romanian software company specialized in online products and applications development.

The company was founded in June, 2003 and the team was formed of 3 young engineers with a true passion for online applications.

The main objectives of Zitec were to grow the number of the team members and to diversify its portfolio for online solutions and services. At this point, Zitec is developing customized web applications in outsourcing system, based on our clients needs in various activity fields such as tourism, financial, e-commerce, video streaming and medicine, by using the latest technologies.

Over the years, we have grown and extended to an international level, so that today we have a diversified portfolio, with clients from USA, Canada, UK, Cyprus, Germany, Italy, Denmark, Ghana, etc.

Zitec has developed partnerships with well known IT companies from around the world such as Zend â€“ Php or MySQL. Among our clients: J.W. Marriott, Mercedes-Benz Romania, Amadeus International, Happy Tour, Romania Libera, Agora Group, Sanoma Hearst Romania, etc.
